reviewText: These movies are awesome and can be watched by the whole family! I can watch them again and again!
Bought as gift and mother loves it.

LOVE COMES SOFTLY is a wonderful series of movies, There are now ten movies in the regular collection plus a holiday special.

All ten of the LOVE COMES SOFTLY movies are now available in a special tenth anniversary set, so instead of buying this set with one DVD and two books, look for

. . . . . . LOVE COMES SOFTLY - TENTH ANNIVERSARY COLLECTION
. . . . . . (see picture)

These are wonderful movies that give us an inspiring look at life in the nineteenth century. You'll be able to read my more detailed review of the collection when you go to the tenth anniversary collection page, along with many other reviews.

These are all five-star movies, and you'll get all ten movies for a bargain collection price, less than $10 for 10 movies.

John

I was loaned this series, before I bought it.  I bought it twice.

At first, I was a bit skeptical because I am a firm believer in the separation of church and state.  And I still am.  This is undeterred by this series.  But I found the intrusion of religion subtle, and it did not spoil the series.

Trained to be an historian, I loved some of the atmospherics of the 19th century.  Maybe I should add that I was weakened by grief due to a family death that brought me to this series.  Somehow, feeling the day-to-day hardships within the series, the good people hurt badly by life, made me feel comforted:  I was not alone.  I was just another good person hurt by the vicissitudes of life.

I was disquieted by the fact that the people who made these dvd's seems to think we have a deficit in memory, so they spring about three to four different actresses upon us for key roles.  But I tried to overlook this, although I did not forgive it.  They worked hard to make us love a particular actress in a role.  Then the next dvd they did a bait and switch.

Before we watch the video, my granddaughters and I read the book.  This is great for us to do and it is taking us time to organize all this.  But when we are all done then we get to watch the movie.  It also makes for great discussion among us.  This is for the young and old.  Great Series!

Once I started watching these movies, I didn't want to stop.  They are so real, so touching and very enjoyable to watch. My daughter who is 13 years old also enjoy watching them and it is good to know that we can still find good, clean movies to watch.  Thanks Amazon.

These movies are wonderful for the whole family, or just you.  The settings are old time but the messages are so relevant and joyous.  I will be purchasing additional copies to be sent as gifts for the upcoming Holiday's.
